title: Add 'Saalana Jalsa 2026' gallery entry with uploaded photos

requirements.text: Create a Gallery section on the website (if it does not already exist) and add a gallery album entry titled 'सालाना जलसा 2026' (Saalana Jalsa 2026) displaying the 4 uploaded event photos as static assets served from frontend/public/assets/generated/.

quotes: सालाना जलसा 2026 के नाम से गैलेरी में एड करे

acceptanceCriteria: A Gallery section is visible on the page, reachable via the navigation header and footer.
The gallery contains an album/card labelled 'सालाना जलसा 2026'.
All 4 uploaded event photos are displayed inside this album in a responsive photo grid.
Photos are served as static files from frontend/public/assets/generated/ using the filenames defined in imageRequirements.
Clicking a photo opens a lightbox or enlarged view.
The section visual style is consistent with the existing site theme (ivory/champagne/gold palette, Devanagari typography).

constraints: Do not modify any file under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
All gallery images must be served as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated/ — do not route them through the backend.
nonGoals: Backend storage or admin upload functionality for gallery images.
Changes to existing sections (Hero, About, Announcements, Donate, Contact, Services).

edits: Optimize and save the uploaded event photo showing a speaker presenting in front of a projected Hindi slide to an audience seated indoors (jalsa-2026-1.dim_1200x800.jpg)
Optimize and save the uploaded event photo showing a speaker presenting next to a green projected slide to an attentive outdoor audience (jalsa-2026-2.dim_1200x800.jpg)
Optimize and save the uploaded event photo showing a large outdoor gathering of men seated in chairs on a terrace/balcony area with lush trees in the background (jalsa-2026-3.dim_1200x800.jpg)
Optimize and save the uploaded event photo showing speakers addressing a large seated outdoor crowd on a terrace with tall trees visible in the background (jalsa-2026-4.dim_1200x800.jpg)
